subtitle: Voyage blog

articles.discover-articles: Discover our latest pieces written with love and filled with tips for your best trips.

about.intro: Hey, it's Charlotte & RÃ©my, we are from Brussels and we try our best to discover and share the best trips.
about.body:
Ever since our young years, we have always enjoyed exploring. We have developed our passion for travelling through numbers of voyages with family, friends and loved ones.

We always take time to plan our trips and blog is one of our favorite source of inspiration. That's why we think it is now time we give back and start writing about our experiences to give as much as possible guidance, tips, itineraries and much more.

blog.intro: We craft blog articles we wish we could have come across while planning and booking for holidays. We aim to cover all sorts of trips, short and long, close and far away.

photos.intro: Here the a list of all the pictures we shared in our articles. Click on a photo to have a better view and click again to travel to the related piece of blog.

contact: Feel free to get in touch and stay connected with us via these different channels.
